### ITT - Lighthouse Repairs Louisbourg, NS

#### Invitation to Qualify: Lighthouse Repairs Louisbourg, NS

##### Background

[Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans] is issuing a request for proposals for the conservation of the Louisbourg Lighthouse, a Registered Federal Heritage Building and Level II Resource within the Fortress of Louisbourg National Historic Site of Canada (Nova Scotia).

##### Purpose

The purpose of this Invitation to Qualify (ITT) is to identify qualified contractors to undertake the conservation work for the Louisbourg Lighthouse. 

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes, but is not limited to: 

* The conservation of the Louisbourg Lighthouse, a Recognized Federal Heritage Building and Level II Resource
* Work to be completed within 40 weeks of contract award
* Contractor must comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and standards

#### Eligibility and Qualifications

* This ITT is open to pre-qualified firms who have qualified under the Invitation to Qualify process posted on CanadaBuys
* Bidders are responsible for verifying their eligibility and qualifications before submitting a bid
* All enquiries must be submitted to the Contracting Authority through the Messages function in SAP Ariba

#### Submissions

* Proposals must be submitted only via SAP Ariba
* Estimated cost is between $1,000,001 to $5,000,000
* Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: August 31st, 2023 at 2:00 PM
* Calculating days and time left before the closing date ... we approach a hurdle
